Awlright dudes and dudettes.

You will notice a [Godsify!] link in your Epicenter. You can use this to send a writeup or document to the [gods] weblog (just like the front page). This weblog is only viewable by members of the gods group, but if you want to make sure that an announcement is securely away from user eyes, make it a [restricted_superdoc], then godsify! it.

Ever trying to increase da administration communication...

--[nate]
node.title: Godsify!
